about_the_game:
About the Game


Gwiryungdan is a 3D action RPG set against the backdrop of Korea's prosperous Joseon Dynasty,
immersing players in a unique cultural and historical experience.

Embark on a journey as [Maru], a young man earning a living by impersonating a revered member of [Gwiryungdan],
a renowned military organization dedicated to tracking down mysterious creatures across the land of the Joseon dynasty.
The organization's founders, the 12 Zodiac Gods, are masters of ancient weapons.

As [Maru], you find yourself entwined in a story of the Joseon people that demands your attention.
How long will you merely "pretend" to be their hope and savior? And where have the 12 Zodiac Gods disappeared to?

Please note that [Gwiryungdan] is currently under development,
with the anticipated release date later in 2025. Stay tuned for updates, and we appreciate your support!

How long will you merely "pretend" to be their hope and savior? And where have the 12 Zodiac Gods disappeared to?

Please note that [Gwiryungdan] is currently under development,

name: Gwiryungdan : Joseon's Twelve

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400 or AMD Ryzen 3 3300X
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1060, 3GB or AMD Radeon RX 580, 4GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 or Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-8700K or AMD Ryzen 5 3600X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1070, 8GB or AMD Radeon RX VEGA 56, 8GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 20 GB available space

short_description: Embark on a journey as [Maru], a young man earning a living by impersonating a revered member of [Gwiryungdan], a renowned military organization dedicated to tracking down mysterious creatures across the land of the Joseon dynasty.
supported_languages:
English, Japanese, Korean*, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
